Title: Legal status quo (2017)
Wind energy: Capacity limited to designated areas for wind energy (VR/EG).
PV ground mounted: Areas along highways and railway tracks and 0.1 % of agricultural land (strict and weak restrictions apply).

Title: Highly increased wind+PV
Wind energy: Minimum distance of wind energy converters to settlements reduced to 500 m and wind installations in forests allowed.
PV ground mounted: Areas along highways and railway tracks and 1.0 % of agricultural land (only strict restrictions apply).
PV rooftop: Usage of 100 % of available roof area.
